comment: Spotify's new features are making it worse. I can't even play my favorite song more than once; to replay it, it's asking for a premium membership or requiring me to wait until tomorrow. Also, the repeat shuffle mode is off. Now, add more features to make it even more unbearable, ensuring it can no longer be used for free without premium.Alternatives options are there to use rather than to use this useless app.
key sentence: Key words: premium membership, repeat shuffle mode, free limitations
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Download Liked Songs', 'description': 'Download all liked songs'}, {'name': 'Disable Shuffle', 'description': 'Disable shuffle for this liked songs'}, {'name': 'Tap to play Liked Songs', 'description': 'Tap to play a liked songs'}, {'name': 'More Options for Song', 'description': 'Access more options for a specific song'}]

operations.event: click<button id=20 class ="com.spotify.music:id/shuffle_button" alt="Disable shuffle for this liked songs">  </button>
